import React from 'react' import featured from './Carddata' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const ThemeCard = () => { return ( <> { featured.map((cur,ind) => { return (
{cur.theme}

{cur.heading}

By - Themeforest

Rating - {cur.rating}

{cur.para}

${cur.price}

) }) } ) } export default ThemeCard
